name: tech_snapshot_10q
title: 10 Technical Overview Analysis Questions
description: Interpretive technical analysis using recent snapshot values for trend, momentum, volatility, and volume.

questions.text: Looking at the relationship between close price, STL trend, and STL speed - does the overall trend structure appear healthy and aligned? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.
Examining STL residuals over the past 7 days - is price tracking the trend cleanly, or showing significant deviation? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.
Considering both STL speed and acceleration together - is the trend momentum strengthening, stable, or weakening? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.

Analyzing RSI, MACD, and their recent trajectory - are momentum indicators showing convergence toward bullish or bearish territory? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.

Looking at MACD line, signal line, and histogram development - does the MACD structure suggest building momentum or deterioration? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.
Comparing RSI positioning and directional movement (recent changes) - is momentum accelerating or decelerating? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.
Evaluating ADX level and the spread between +DI/-DI - does this indicate a strong directional trend or weak/ranging market? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.

Examining the relationship between ADX, directional indicators, and recent price action - is trend conviction increasing or fading? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.

Analyzing volume pattern alongside price movement over recent days - does volume behavior confirm or contradict the price trend? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.
Looking at ATR changes and price volatility - is the market showing healthy volatility patterns or stress signals? Draft a deep, multi-aspect analysis. Include a detailed chain of thinking.
